thread.title: That rare hotel: creative modern decor but really comfortable!
thread.title_full: That rare hotel: creative modern decor but really comfortable! - Review of St Martins Lane London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CavalinoRampante
title: That rare hotel: creative modern decor but really comfortable!
text: I love the modern decor at this hotel: it is innovative and fashionably cutting-edge with more than the odd hint of whimsy, yet comfortable and practical. How unusual to find any hotel that meets and exceeds my wife's reasonable expectation for a good combination of mirrors and lighting for hair and make-up, let alone one that offers such a post-Starck feast for the eyes.
